what: Running the multi loan book analysis
title: Run PACTA on multiple loan books easily
text: analysis run two steps. first step run process matching raw input loan books asset/based company data (ABCD), using run_matching.R script. Initial matching results saved matched/ directory specified config.yml. files need validated manually. manual validation matched loan books completed, checked files processed, using script run_pacta_multi_loanbook.R, calculates standard PACTA results loan books additional related metrics analytics. scripts can either run line--line, calling source("run_matching.R") source("run_pacta_multi_loanbook.R").
